Publication module¶

class scholarly.publication.Publication(nav, _Publication__data, pubtype=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

Returns an object for a single publication

property bibtex¶

Returns the publication as a bibtex entry

Getter

Returns a bibtex entry in text format

Type

str

fill()[source]¶

Populate the Publication with information from its profile

property filled¶

Indicates whether a publication has been filled

Getter

True if publication is filled, False otherwise.

Type

bool

property get_citedby¶

Searches GScholar for other articles that cite this Publication and returns a Publication generator.

Getter

Returns a Generator of Publications that cited the current.

Type

Generator<Publication>
